Title: Provides for the licensing and regulation of the practice of neurofeedback therapy
Summary: Provides for the licensing and regulation of the practice of neurofeedback therapy; defines practice of neurofeedback therapy; establishes state board of neurofeedback therapy and the requirements to qualify for a license as a neurofeedback therapist.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the practice of neurofeedback therapy
